mapper.select: select dtl.id, dtl.package_id, dtl.active_flag, dtl.service_id, service.status, service.service_name, service.service_type, service.rel_type, service.sex_select, service.price from xzh_card_package_dtl dtl left join xzh_service service on dtl.service_id = service.id where dtl.package_id = #{package_id} and dtl.active_flag != 0
select count(*) as count_service_map from xzh_service_mapping where xzh_service_id = #{id} and active_flag = 1 and status = 'IN_SERVICE'
mapper.update: update xzh_service set active_flag = #{active_flag}, service_name = #{service_name}, service_code = #{service_code}, service_type = #{service_type}, rel_type = #{rel_type}, status = #{status}, logo_img = #{logo_img}, sex_select = #{sex_select}, price = #{price}, city_select = #{city_select}, intro = #{intro} where id = #{id}
update xzh_service set modifier = null, modify_date = sysdate, active_flag = '0' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select map.*, service.service_name as supplier_service_name, service.market_price, service.cost_price, service.service_type, supplier.supplier_name, supplier.id as supplier_id from xzh_service_mapping map left join xzh_supplier_service service on map.supplier_service_id = service.id left join xzh_supplier supplier on service.supplier_id = supplier.id where xzh_service_id = #{xzh_service_id}
mapper.insert: insert into xzh_service_mapping ( id, active_flag, status, seq, supplier_service_id, xzh_service_id ) values ( sys_guid(), #{active_flag},#{status},#{seq},#{supplier_service_id}, #{xzh_service_id} )
